apps.linear.postfix
Class PostfixEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  apps.linear.postfix.PostfixEvaluator

public class PostfixEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

This class evaluates a postfix expression. It can be made to evaluate in parts, so progress can be monitored.

Author:
Sesh Venugopal

runSome

public void runSome(int howManySteps,
                    java.io.PrintWriter pw)
             throws IllegalExpressionException
Runs this evaluator for a given number of evaluation steps - each step processes one additional token of the expression.

Parameters:
howManySteps - Number of steps.
pw - PrintWriter used to write output.
Throws:
IllegalExpressionException - If expression if not legal postfix.
